field.label: Form Fields
field.comment:
• Tip: Display custom tooltips and will overwrite any default tooltips.
  • All readonly fields are defined in the system and can be configured from different locations (like street fields count, gender etc) and might need to be enabled/configured from Magento settings: stores > configuration > customer configuration first.
  • Fields you can edit (like some street fields) are not required or enabled from magento configuration
  • ADD button is not meant for adding new fields to checkout address forms but rather to include 3rd party objects to the mix to allow sorting
  • The "Auto Save" checkbox enables autosaving for that field. However, if it is unchecked and the field still autosaves, a form modifier may be overriding this behavior.
